import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-main', templateUrl: './main.component.html', styleUrls: ['./main.component.css'] }) export class MainComponent { productList = [ { id: 1, name: 'Đồng hồ Rolex', price: 1000 }, { id: 2, name: 'Đồng hồ Omega', price: 800 }, { id: 3, name: 'Đồng hồ Casio', price: 100 }, {id:4, name: 'Đồng hồ casio', price: 900}, {id:5, name: ' Đồng hồ omega', price:500}, ]; }
